channel.title: Fixing The Wild Area In Pimpscape
channel.description: Well, on my Pimpscape server. You can Pk anywhere. How would I go about changing the the wild zone only to Edgeville?

item.title: Fixing The Wild Area In Pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

Thanks man.

EDIT: Could you give me the ones to make everywhere but Edgeville wild to be safe? Save me a lot of time developing my server.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing The Wild Area In Pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @tuptup13 tuptup13
item.description:
@tuptup13 wrote:

Go into your client.java and look for this

public boolean nonWild() { and add this after the last l

(absX >=botlx && absX <= toprx && absY >= botly && absY <=topry) || Then just add the bottom left co ods where i said and the top right co ods. It works in a squareâ€¦ Just add that whereever you need a safe zone
